recipe_name: Penne with chilli, garlic, herbs and olive oil
author: Gino D'Acampo
method: Place the oil, parsley, garlic, chilli flakes and salt into a food processor and blend until smooth.  Stir the mixture into the cooked penne pasta, and pile onto a plate. Garnish with fresh torn basil leaves and the shavings of white truffle.
